doc.title: Flawless
doc.plot: A young high society mother alienates her daughter. The mother constantly puts down her child's opinions and urges her to hide all her emotions and act "lady-like". The distraught child runs away from the shop without notice. Upon the discovery that her child is missing, the mother begins to show worry, which slowly develops into full outburst of emotion. When the mother finally notices her child she weeps uncontrollably and tries to embrace her daughter. The girl doesn't give in, and snaps at her mother urging her to act more civilized and "lady-like"
